verses.verse: It <S%H4428>happened,<s%> when all the kings of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> who were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> who were by the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> how that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had dried <S%H3001>up<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> until we had passed <S%H5674>over,<s%> that their <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H4549>melted,<s%> neither was there <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in them any <S%H6440>more,<s%> because of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

At that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H6213>"Make<s%> <S%H6697>flint<s%> <S%H2719>knives,<s%> and <S%H4135>circumcise<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the second <S%H8145>time.<s%>"

<S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> himself <S%H6697>flint<s%> <S%H2719>knives,<s%> and <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> at the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of the <S%H6190>foreskins.<s%>

This is the <S%H1697>reason<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised:<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> who were <S%H2145>males,<s%> even all the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> after they came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H3588>For<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who came <S%H3318>out<s%> were <S%H4135>circumcised;<s%> but all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were <S%H3209>born<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> as they came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> had not been <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%>

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> until all the <S%H1471>nation,<s%> even the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> who came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> were <S%H8552>consumed,<s%> because they <S%H8085>didn't<s%> listen to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to them that he <S%H7200>wouldn't<s%> let them see the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers<s%> that he would <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H776>us,<s%> a land <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

Their <S%H1121>children,<s%> whom he raised <S%H6965>up<s%> in their <S%H4135>place,<s%> were circumcised by <S%H3091>Joshua;<s%> for they were <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> because they had not <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> them on the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

It <S%H8552>happened,<s%> when they were done <S%H4135>circumcising<s%> all the <S%H1471>nation,<s%> that they <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in their places in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> until they were <S%H2421>healed.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H3117>"Today<s%> I have rolled <S%H1556>away<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> from off <S%H8034>you.<s%>" Therefore the name of that <S%H4725>place<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> to this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal.<s%> They <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>evening<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

They <S%H398>ate<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>cakes<s%> and parched <S%H5669>grain<s%> of the <S%H5669>produce<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> on the next <S%H4283>day<s%> after the <S%H6453>Passover,<s%> in the <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

The <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H7673>ceased<s%> on the next <S%H4283>day,<s%> after they had <S%H398>eaten<s%> of the <S%H5669>produce<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%> The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4478>didn't<s%> have manna any <S%H398>more;<s%> but they ate of the <S%H8393>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> that <S%H8141>year.<s%>

It <S%H3091>happened,<s%> when Joshua was by <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> that he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H376>behold,<s%> a man <S%H5975>stood<s%> in front of him with his <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H8025>drawn<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> and said to <S%H6862>him,<s%> "Are you for us, or for our adversaries?"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H935>"No;<s%> but I have come now as <S%H8269>commander<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6635>army.<s%>" <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshipped,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H113>him,<s%> "What does my lord <S%H559>say<s%> to his <S%H5650>servant?<s%>"

The <S%H8269>prince<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H6635>army<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> "Take your <S%H5275>shoes<s%> <S%H5394>off<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet;<s%> for the <S%H4725>place<s%> on which you <S%H5975>stand<s%> is <S%H6944>holy.<s%>" <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> did <S%H6213>so.<s%>
